Package modele.partie

Class Compteur

java.lang.Object
modele.partie.Compteur
All Implemented Interfaces:
VisiteurPlateau
public class Compteur
extends java.lang.Object
implements VisiteurPlateau
The Compteur is an agent whose role will be to find the scores of the different players at the end of a round.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Compteur()
    Instantiates the Compteur

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int compterScore​(Carte victoryCard, Plateau plateau)
    Evaluates the total number of points of a player once the board is filed.
    int pointsCouleur​(java.util.ArrayList<Carte> liste, Couleur couleur)
    Evaluates the score given to a specific victory card according to the color of the card on a line or a column.
    int pointsForme​(java.util.ArrayList<Carte> liste, Forme forme)
    Evaluates the score given to a specific victory card according to the geometry of the card on a line or a column.
    int pointsRemplissage​(java.util.ArrayList<Carte> liste, Remplissage remplissage)
    Evaluates the score given to a specific victory card according to the fact that it is filled on a line or a column.
    java.util.ArrayList<Carte> recupererColonne​(int abscisse, Plateau plateau)
    Is used to get a column of the board.
    java.util.ArrayList<Carte> recupererLigne​(int ordonnee, Plateau plateau)
    Is used to get a line of the board.
    void visiter​(Plateau plateau)
    Defines the method that will be used to find the scores

    • recupererLigne

      public java.util.ArrayList<Carte> recupererLigne​(int ordonnee, Plateau plateau)
      Is used to get a line of the board.
      Parameters:
      ordonnee - is the vertical position of the line in the board.
      plateau - is a reference to the board.
      Returns:
      the line as an array.

    • recupererColonne

      public java.util.ArrayList<Carte> recupererColonne​(int abscisse, Plateau plateau)
      Is used to get a column of the board.
      Parameters:
      abscisse - is the horizontal position of the line in the board.
      plateau - is a reference to the board.
      Returns:
      the column as an array.

    • pointsForme

      public int pointsForme​(java.util.ArrayList<Carte> liste, Forme forme)
      Evaluates the score given to a specific victory card according to the geometry of the card on a line or a column.
      Parameters:
      liste - represents a line or a column.
      forme - is the geometry on the victory card.
      Returns:
      the number of points granted to the player for the line according to the geometry of his victory card.

    • pointsRemplissage

      public int pointsRemplissage​(java.util.ArrayList<Carte> liste, Remplissage remplissage)
      Evaluates the score given to a specific victory card according to the fact that it is filled on a line or a column.
      Parameters:
      liste - represents a line or a column.
      remplissage - tells whether the victory card is filled or not.
      Returns:
      the number of points granted to the player for the line according to the parameter of his victory card.

    • pointsCouleur

      public int pointsCouleur​(java.util.ArrayList<Carte> liste, Couleur couleur)
      Evaluates the score given to a specific victory card according to the color of the card on a line or a column.
      Parameters:
      liste - represents a line or a column.
      color - is the color of the victory card.
      Returns:
      the number of points granted to the player for the line according to the color of his victory card.

      Parameters:
      victoryCard - the victory card of the player
      plateau - a reference on the board
      Returns:
